{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3330233,"name":"Asher","username":"WalterTheMoral","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/w/6f9a4e/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-03-11T18:35:45.891Z","cooked":"

Hello all!
I have been having some trouble with placing my robot as a custom asset in Advantage Scope. When I place the chassis, everything works, and I am able to update its position and angle through the “config.json”, but for the other components, their position and angle don’t change no matter what I write in the file.
I’d appreciate any help, and I’ve attached the config file in the topic.
Thanks for the help!
config.json (756 Bytes)
